channel.title: sad on LS | Papermod
channel.description: Recent content in sad on LS | Papermod

item.title: Helping Out a Friend, Sort Of, Part 1
item.description: A woman asks her boyfriend to take her profligate daughter away and train her to behave, as he had done with his own daughter. He agrees and 'kidnaps' the daughter,taking her to a secluded spot for a couple of weeks, and punishing her.

item.title: Getting to Know Step-Mother, Part 1
item.description: Barbara learns quickly that her step-mother and step-brother are cruel and devious. Things get even worse after her father dies. She soon realizes that she is doomed to a life of pain and suffering.
